think_procedure: 1. Identify the purpose of the knob 'wal_sync_method' in PostgreSQL. 2. Understand that this knob determines the method used for writing WAL (Write Ahead Log) data to disk. 3. Evaluate whether this knob has any special values that change its behavior significantly. 4. Recognize that 'wal_sync_method' can take different methods, but does not have a special value like -1 or 0 that disables a feature or alters its operation fundamentally. 5. Conclude that this knob follows a natural order and does not qualify as a special knob.
